verses.text: Then Bildad the Shuhite answered and said:
Dominion and fear are with Him. On His high places He maketh peace.
His hosts – are they not beyond counting? Whom doth not His ambush surprise?
How can man then be just before God? How can one born of woman be pure?
See! the moon herself is not clear, And the stars are not pure in His sight:
How much less is man – a mere maggot; And the on of man – but a worm!
